description_text:
Hello!
Have a great day!
Currently, my affiliate marketing commission hasn't been paid yet, even
though the payment deadline has passed.

I hope you will pay soon so I can have more funds to optimize my
advertising campaign in the future. Thank you very much.

conversations.body_text: Hi KIÊN LE,  We normally pay the commission for November in January. A batch of commissions was processed a couple of days ago, and payments over USD 100 were prioritized and sent out first.
